document_data.name: ''Giant's Bane''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Giant's bane''''' were enchanted [[sling]] bullets created for defense against [[giant]]s.
document_data.Powers: ''Giant's bane'' bullets were enchanted to deal additional damage when used against giants.
document_data.History: ''Giant's bane'' ammunition was created by [[halfling]]s, defending their homes from giant raids. Over the years, these bullets were the result of many giants' demise. By late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''giant's bane'' bullets were quite often encountered across the [[Sword Coast]] as well as the [[Moonsea]] regions of [[Faer√ªn]].
